name: Brandwidth
description: Brandwidth is a fully integrated, award-winning innovation agency. With offices in London, Windsor and San Francisco, and over 100 in-house experts, we reinvest over 10% of our turnover into innovation. We apply it through insight, creativity and technology, to projects across the full spectrum of branding, marketing and digital challenges. And we’re a trusted partner to some of the world’s biggest brands right across sectors, including Apple, DuPont and Disney.
